segments.text: I notice the light coming in from the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights the garden path and bushes so nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the scene feels a bit tense though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in her task, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling over uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a wasteful mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there unaware, one foot wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the cookie jar is open in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool, reaching in precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's going to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate, trying to be careful I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches expectantly, hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking thinking of what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this in such an ordinary kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
